name: SSKI
indications: sski ® ( potassium iodide oral solution , usp ) expectorant symptomatic treatment chronic pulmonary diseases tenacious mucus complicates problem , including bronchial asthma , bronchitis pulmonary emphysema .
warningsAndPrecautions: ndc 17856-0114-01 ( potassium iodide oral solution , usp ) supplied 0.1g/0.1ml 120 syringes inactive ingredient : sodium thiosulfate preservative .
indications_original:
SSKI
 
  ®(potassium iodide oral solution, USP) is for use as an expectorant in the symptomatic treatment of chronic pulmonary diseases where tenacious mucus complicates the problem, including bronchial asthma, bronchitis and pulmonary emphysema.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
NDC 17856-0114-01 (potassium iodide oral solution, USP) is supplied in 0.1G/0.1mL 120 Syringes
                  Inactive ingredient: Sodium thiosulfate as a preservative.
adverseReactions_original: Contraindicated in patients with a known sensitivity to iodides.
